mapper.select: SELECT concat(concat(Min(duration_start),"-"),Max(duration_end)) as maxMin FROM t_demand_info where scenariosId = #{scenariosId}
SELECT MAX(duration_end) FROM t_demand_info where scenariosId = #{scenariosId}
SELECT MIN(duration_start) FROM t_demand_info where scenariosId = #{scenariosId}
SELECT * from t_demand_info d where d.scenariosId = #{scenariosId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_demand_info where scenariosId = #{scenariosId}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_demand_info SET date = #{date},site_collect = #{siteCodeCollect},site_delivery=#{siteCodeDelivery},product_type=#{productType}, duration_start=#{durationStart},duration_end=#{durationEnd},weight=#{weight},votes=#{votes},ageing=#{ageing} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT d.duration_end-s.arr_time as arr_time,s.unload_vol_sum as vol FROM t_demand_info d left join t_solution_route s on d.scenariosId=#{scenariosId} and d.site_delivery=s.unload_loc
SELECT distinct(site_collect) FROM t_demand_info where scenariosId = #{scenariosId}
SELECT distinct(site_delivery) FROM t_demand_info where scenariosId = #{scenariosId}
